item.description:
We have selected "The Trial by Franz Kafka" to read at for our next meet up. Depending on how many show and do their "homework"

We will divide the group into smaller groups to stimulate discussion. If the group is as large as it was at the first meeting.

If this isn't a book u want to read stay tuned for future books.

Please note I picked Panera Bread for our meeting in Hamden. This place will have adequate parking. I hope to see you then.


Mark

group.name: People in their 20s and 30s Book Club

item.name: 20s and 30s Book Club August Meetup
